content.description: This climb goes up thin cracks up a rather large tower, just left of a left slanting OWth crack. There is one or more bolts to supplement the thin cracks.
content.protection: Looks like mostly small to medium pieces, and a few QDs for a bolt or two.
content.location: On the middle tower in the Tower of Power Area.

climbs.name: 5 Barmaids in My Pocket
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Tucker Tech, Mark Synek, Frank Bentwood, Greg Epperson

content.description: This route goes up a big buttress in the Tower of Power Area of Queen Mountain.  It is a few buttresses left of the climb Poer to the People. Climb past a couple of bolts in a seam  to a crack which is followed to the top.
content.protection: A couple of QDs for the bolts down low, then a standard rack for the crack ( small to large) .
content.location: On a buttress to the left of the climb Power to the People in the Tower of Power Area of Queen Mountain.
